title: PM directs devising effective strategy for economic stability
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 04 (APP): Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar on Monday directed the Ministry of Finance to devise an effective strategy to bring in economic stability in the country.
The prime minister said this in a meeting with Interim Finance Minister Shamshad Akhtar who called on him here.
The finance minister also briefed the prime minister on current economic situation in the country.
